fields.name: Curse:
fields.value: Your Current hand becomes **ethereal**. **Ethereal** cards count torwards your current cards Permanently. If you get this card twice in the same game, additionally draw 3 **ethereal** cards.

fields.name: Trigger:
fields.value: Get rid of all **ethereal** cards in your hand.

fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Give this card to someone else
